dinner

Need to Know

Reservations are available 14 days in advance. A portion of our space is held nightly for Walk - ins. If you are running late, please call us at (646) 630-8057

About The Crown NYC

The Crown, located on the 21st floor of Hotel 50 Bowery, is a rooftop bar operated by hospitality leader Gerber Group. Guests can enjoy the Gerber Group’s classic and seasonal cocktails and elevated bar fare, while taking in the amazing unobstructed views of both the Manhattan and Brooklyn skylines, either indoors or outdoors. The Crown’s beverage menu features a rotating selection of Gerber Group’s classic and seasonal cocktails – such as the GG Manhattan, Hibiscus Mule or Chinatown Spritz - alongside an expansive collection of small-batch spirits, regionally brewed craft beers, and universal wine offerings. Elevated globally inspired small bites including Pan Fried Chicken Dumplings, Lobster Rolls and Pork Buns complement the bar.
